sentences.en: Usually the dues are calculated on the registered tonnage of the ship.
sentences.cn: 通常港口税是以船只的注册吨位计算的.

sentences.en: With 500 tonnage traffic capacity, Zhangjing River is a golden line for water transport.
sentences.cn: 张泾河通航能力达500吨, 是水上运输的“黄金要道”.
